programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: A vengeful spirit takes the form of the Tooth Fairy to destroy the inhabitants of a town that lynched her 150 years earlier

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A group of four friends who rent a luxury yacht for a weekend of sun and sailing find themselves in a nightmare scenario when they are left floating in the ocean as their vessel drifts out of reach - with one stranded mother's newborn infant on board alone. Eric Dane, Susan May Pratt, Ali Hillis and Niklaus Lange star in this taut thriller

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: An ambitious ghost writer (Ewan McGregor) is hired to pen the forthcoming autobiography of a controversial former British prime minister (Pierce Brosnan) but uncovers an incendiary secret from his subject's past that indicates a vast global conspiracy is controlling world events. Olivia Williams costars in this tense thriller from director Roman Polanski

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe

programme.title: 2017 Episode 3
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at the final two teams in the Stanley Cup® Final, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports(c)

programme.title: 2017 Episode 3
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at the final two teams in the Stanley Cup® Final, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports(c)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Ghost Busters
programme.desc: In episode 313, the third season finale, Penn and Teller diligently set about debunking the paranormal world of ghosts, spooks and phantoms - and those who claim they can detect or exorcise such flights of fancy(c)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Denzel Washington stars as Rubin "Hurricane" Carter -- a man whose dreams of winning the middleweight boxing title are destroyed when he is wrongly accused of killing three people in a New Jersey bar. Years later, in jail, a young man begins an impassioned and moving fight to prove Hurricane's innocence. Also stars Liev Schreiber

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special

programme.title: 2017 Episode 3
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at the final two teams in the Stanley Cup® Final, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports(c)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife(n)

programme.title: Profanity
programme.desc: In episode 206, Penn and Teller devote an entire episode to the cultural war on words and the power we give them, focusing on the latest actions of the FCC and other groups that subvert the First Amendment in their quest to "clean up" the airwaves(n)

programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at the final two teams in the Stanley Cup® Final, featuring unprecedented access on the ice, in the locker rooms and inside the minds of the men chasing one of the most elusive prizes in all of sports(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs(n)

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a man stumbles upon a bloody crime scene, a pickup truck loaded with heroin and two million dollars in cash, his decision to take the money and run ignites an unstoppable chain reaction of violence and mayhem in writer/director Joel and Ethan Coen's Academy Award winning thriller. Starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: A vengeful spirit takes the form of the Tooth Fairy to destroy the inhabitants of a town that lynched her 150 years earlier(n)

programme.title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez returns as hockey coach Gordon Bombay in this fun-filled family sequel. Sidelined by a knee injury, Gordon is offered a chance to coach the USA's team at the Goodwill Games in Los Angeles, but his head is quickly turned by lucrative endorsement deals and the good life on the left coast. Kathryn Erbe and Michael Tucker costar

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: In this adventure surf film a young woman, haunted by the memory of her deceased mother, leaves Malibu behind and heads to the breathtaking coast of South Africa on a quest to fulfill a surfing dream, with nothing but her mom's journal as a guide and a fun-loving group of surf fanatics cheering her on

programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star

programme.title: Down To Earth
programme.desc: Chris Rock is struggling comedian Lance Burton, who is taken long before his time by an anxious angel and finds temporary refuge back on Earth in the body of a prejudiced, white millionaire. Soon Lance ("Charles" to those who only know him by his new identity) is wooing a community rights activist (Regina King) and dodging a bullet as his wife and her lover try to kill him(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Carmen and her brother Juni think they're typical kids until they discover their parents are former spies who've been kidnapped by a sinister children's show host. Now it's up to a brother-sister duo to rescue their parents and find out if master spy skills run in the family in this family adventure starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino and Alan Cumming(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids: Game Over
programme.desc: Under-age agents Juni and Carmen Cortez journey inside the virtual reality world of a 3-D video game designed to outsmart them, as the awe-inspiring graphics and creatures of gaming come to real life. Relying on lightning-quick reflexes, the Spy Kids must battle through tougher and tougher levels of the game, facing challenges that include racing against road warriors and surfing on boiling lava, in order to save the world from a power hungry villain(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene

programme.desc: In episodes 101 and 102, the series premiere, Jenny moves to L.A. with Tim and meets her lesbian neighbors and their circle of friends - including Marina, whose pass at Jenny awakens doubts about her path in life

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Requiem For A Dream
programme.desc: Gritty, intense drama from director Darren Aronofsky ("Pi") that concerns the drug abuse of New York heroin users Harry (Jared Leto) and Tyrone (Marlon Wayans), as well as Harry's diet pill-addicted mother Sara (Oscar nominee Ellen Burstyn). As his world becomes increasingly focused on scoring, Harry drags his beautiful girlfriend Marion (Jennifer Connelly) down with him, leading to a harrowing finale. Chris McDonald, Louise Lasser and Keith David costar in this stylishly directed tragedy based on the novel by Hubert Selby Jr

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel

programme.title: To Catch A Thief
programme.desc: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence. Cary Grant and Grace Kelly star in this classic Alfred Hitchcock thriller

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Let's Do It
programme.desc: In episode 103, Bette and Tina wait eagerly to see if Tina will get pregnant; Tim, unaware of her encounter with Jenny, invites Marina to a dinner party, while Kit tries to make amends with Bette(c)

programme.title: Longing
programme.desc: In episode 104, Bette takes a desperate step to win her battle of wills with the chairman of the gallery board; Jenny struggles with her feelings for Marina; Alice tries to regain her self-respect after a run-in with an ex; Dana finally gets a date with Lara(c)

programme.title: Factory Girl
programme.desc: Sienna Miller stars in this absorbing biography of Edie Sedgwick, the socialite who dropped out of college, befriended counterculture artist Andy Warhol, had an affair with a legendary musician, and used her stunning good looks to become a successful cover girl - until mental illness and drugs destroyed her life. Guy Pearce, Hayden Christensen, Illeana Douglas, Jimmy Fallon and Mena Suvari costar in this riveting look back at a fascinating era from director George Hickenlooper

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: A Civil Action
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as Jan Schlichtmann, a cynical, high-priced personal injury attorney who only takes big-money cases he can safely settle out of court. Though his latest case appears straightforward, Jan soon becomes entangled in an epic legal battle on behalf of his clients - one where he's willing to put his career, reputation and all that he owns on the line. Robert Duvall, William H. Macy and John Lithgow co-star

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs

programme.title: Manglehorn
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Al Pacino stars as a reclusive small town locksmith who has never quite recovered from losing the love of his life but as he begins to forge tenuous human connections and approach the possibility of new love, he finds himself at a crossroads between the past and present. Also stars Academy Award® winner Holly Hunter

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: From writer/director Paul Haggis ("Million Dollar Baby") comes this Best Picture Oscar-winning drama that follows the intersecting lives of several Los Angeles natives whose attitudes toward race are challenged by a series of fateful events. Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film(n)

programme.title: Lies, Lies, Lies

programme.title: Lawfully
programme.desc: In episode 106, Tim discovers Jenny's affair with Marina - leading to a potentially disastrous choice for the couple's shaky relationship; the reaction of Bette's father to Tina's pregnancy devastates Bette and leads Kit to confront him on her behalf(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain

programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realization that they scared away a friend's fiancée, two hard-partying pals set out on a wild journey to Mexico to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Cake
programme.desc: A wedding-wary writer takes over the reigns of her father's bridal magazine, where she meets two men who cause her to rethink her position on marriage. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Making of 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2'
programme.desc: A look at "My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2," a 2016 sequel to the 2002 hit that follows the Portokalos clan as they celebrate another momentous walk down the aisle. The film stars Nia Vardalos, John Corbett, Lainie Kazan and Michael Constantine, and is directed by Kirk Jones. (cc)(n)

Jackie Robinson breaks Major League Baseball's color barrier when he is signed to the Brooklyn Dodgers by the team's forward-thinking general manager, Branch Rickey. The gifted athlete deals with tremendous pressure and threats from racist fans and players, but perseveres to become a legendary baseball player and a heroic figure in American history. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman's Show
programme.desc: Two naive Americans visit London; a topless Sally Preston holds her first meeting with constituents; Judi Dench sneaks into a movie theater; a man pitches his latest idea for a weather app; a modeling agent does her best to scout new faces. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Exhilarating and emotionally powerful Best Picture about an illiterate orphan from the slums of India who is on the verge of winning the ultimate prize on a popular TV quiz show. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Net neutrality in the U.S.; the American Health Care Act of 2017; and Eminem's court fight with New Zealand's National Party are discussed. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.sub-title: The Most Powerful Man in the World (and His Identical Twin Brother)
programme.desc: Kevin's mission of mercy finds him assuming an alternate identity. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina works on her book as her staff prepare for the ceremony to unveil her portrait. Meanwhile, Jonah tries to weasel his way onto the guest list; and Dan struggles to solve his on-screen chemistry problem. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body. (cc)(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck pals become arms dealers, but get in over their heads when they land a $300 million contract with the U.S. government to supply weaponry to forces in Afghanistan. Based on true events. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman Winter's War
programme.desc: This spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: A somber vampire mesmerizes a young reporter with the story of his ghastly transformation from grieving aristocrat to immortal monster, beginning in 18th-century New Orleans with his first encounters with the charismatic and decadent bloodsucker Lestat. The two vamps remain deeply, if reluctantly, connected over the years, while becoming intimately involved with others of their kind, including a mature immortal in a young child's body. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: When he has a vision of his flight to Paris crashing, a teen traveling with his French club makes a scene and they are all kicked off the airline. The plane goes down and the survivors are grateful, but Death hunts them down. (cc)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: While driving home from college on deserted rural highways, a brother and sister's road trip takes a surprising turn when they encounter a terrifying supernatural being. (cc)

programme.title: The Purge Election Year
programme.desc: In the third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, a former police sergeant who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge." (cc)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: A woman grows suspicious of her astronaut husband, who acts strangely after a space mission. The film suffers from a slow pace and stiff dialogue. Johnny Depp, Charlize Theron. Written and directed by Rand Ravich. (cc)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An ambitious stock broker becomes the protégé of a ruthless corporate shark. Eventually the billionaire takes a financial interest in the airline company where the protégé's father has been employed for decades. (cc)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. (cc)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: This sports-history saga is the fact-based tale of the Texas Western squad that won the 1966 NCAA basketball championship—the first team to do so starting an all-black lineup. (cc)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: A working-class family man becomes convinced he's being haunted after he agrees to let his sister-in-law hypnotize him at a party. Later, both he and his son start to see the ghost of a missing local girl. (cc)

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: An ace astronaut plays host to an alien that shares a cosmic connection with Eve, a clone created by the government to gain an understanding of how to combat extra terrestrials. (cc)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Blind lawyer Matt Murdock, whose smell, touch, taste and hearing have been heightened as a result of a chemical accident, uses his superpowers to fight crime as the costumed vigilante Daredevil. With the help of Elektra, Murdock takes on mob boss Kingpin and his hired assassin Bullseye. (cc)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: A misanthropic Marine gunnery sergeant trains new recruits to invade Grenada. Meanwhile, the tough-talking veteran repeatedly runs afoul of his younger, progressive-minded superiors. (cc)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Hal Moore leads the 7th Cavalry into the first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965. Contained to an area the size of a football field and surrounded by 2,000 enemy troops, Moore and his men fight for survival in one of the bloodiest engagements of the war. (cc)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Two street racers go undercover to take down a drug magnate in this sequel to 2001's "The Fast and the Furious." (cc)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this Western thriller. (cc)

programme.title: The Mummy Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex. Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army. (cc)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Death row criminal John Coffey has been sentenced for the murders of two innocent girls, but his kind manner doesn't seem to fit the mold of a cold killer. The prison guards soon discover that Coffey seems to have supernatural powers of healing. (cc)

programme.desc: A journalist recalls memories of her friend Jorge Mario Bergoglio, the man who would later be known as Pope Francis. (cc)

programme.title: Sgt. Bilko
programme.desc: A conniving army sergeant pulls numerous cons while feuding with one of his former victims who attempts to get him kicked out of the service. (cc)

programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol. (cc)

programme.desc: A young FBI agent goes undercover to investigate a series of hijackings. Rapidly becoming involved in gang activity, including late-night car races, he begins to relate with his subjects and finds himself falling in love with the gang leader's sister. (cc)

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Nashville *
programme.desc: Deacon tries to help Daphne pass her history class, but Daphne isn't motivated. Meanwhile, Juliette gives Maddie unsolicited advice about a song; and Scarlett and Gunnar return from their tour. (cc)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Ride Along
programme.desc: The boys ride along with Gary (Michael Rapaport); Monica and Rachel overhear bride-to-be Emily's urgent phone message to Ross. Ross: David Schwimmer. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Gary (Michael Rapaport) asks Phoebe to live with him; a game of catch goes on for hours; Rachel buys an expensive cat. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Ross: David Schwimmer. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Joey's Big Break
programme.desc: Joey is cast in an independent film to be shot in the desert outside Las Vegas; Phoebe's angry with Ross. Dr. Miller: Michael Monks. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler break the news about their cohabitation plans to their respective roommates, but Monica feels slighted when Rachel's reaction doesn't measure up to Joey's. Meanwhile, Phoebe leads a reluctant Ross in an exercise to determine his true feelings for Rachel. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Series clips illustrate family recollections as the kids put together a scrapbook for Vivian and Philip. Jazz: Jeffrey A. Townes. Philip: James Avery. Vivian: Janet Hubert-Whitten. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Vy anticipates Will's graduation with enthusiasm, but there may be discord when she learns Will is failing music. Ms. Bassin: Rosalind Cash. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Will: Will Smith. Veronica: Karen Kirkland. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Angie decides to home school Carmen after her private school rejects her and Angie's employer goes under. Janet: Kaitlin Olson. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. Ernie: Valente Rodriguez. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Popularity issues plague both Carmen and Max, but in their efforts to improve, only one gets arrested. Kyle: Will Myer. Trevor: Landon Bell. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: George interviews for a job in Colorado, but lies that it's just a vacation to the kids, who find their new environment not so different from L.A. Ed: George Wendt. Winnie: Marietta Deprima. Li'l Bit: Skye McCole Bartusiak. Tom: Kyle Searles. Vic: Emiliano Diez. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: In Colorado, George pushes the kids to enjoy their new freedom, but their old activities set town tongues wagging. Winnie: Marietta Deprima. Ed: George Wendt. Li'l Bit: Skye McCole Bartusiak. Tom: Kyle Searles. Vic: Emiliano Diez. Benny: Belita Moreno. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: A merger saddles George with a co-manager, whom he not-so-subtly tries to investigate when she dines at the Lopezes'. Vanessa: Kimberly Williams-Paisley. Jack: Jack Blessing. Randy: Nick Offerman. Angie: Constance Marie. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Carmen wants birth-control pills for her 16th birthday, and Angie and George blame her boyfriend Jason, prompting a talk with him. Jason: Bryan Fisher. Vic: Emiliano Diez. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: Friends Don't Let Friends Marry Drunks

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: Money Talks; SpongeBob vs. the Patty Gadget; Slimy Dancing
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs' wish that his money could talk is granted, and it tells him how it wants to be spent; SpongeBob pits his skills against a patty-making machine; SpongeBob trains for the Bikini Bottom dance contest with Squidward's help. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob writes a letter to the Vikings, hoping to learn more about them so he can get Krusty Krab's new Viking-themed promotion; SpongeBob cuts a boating-school class in order to go to a book signing by his favorite superheroes. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: To Love a Patty; Breath of Fresh Squidward
programme.desc: SpongeBob cooks the perfect patty and can't let go of it; Squidward becomes fun and friendly after shocking himself on his own security fence, but his new attitude annoys SpongeBob. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pup Pup Goose; Pup Pup and Away
programme.desc: Marshal befriends a gosling and names it Fuzzy; Mayor Goodway accidentally goes aloft in a hot-air balloon, necessitating a rescue. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save an Elephant Family; Pups and the Mischievous Kittens
programme.desc: The pups go on a safari and wind up reuniting a family of elephants; a group of rowdy kittens wreak havoc on the town. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A farmer's carrots vanish; Katie enters one of the pups in a grooming contest. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save Apollo; Pups Save the Hippos
programme.desc: TV hero Apollo gets captured by his top enemy and asks Rubble to help him; the circus hippos escape after damaging a trapeze, so Paw Patrol search for the runaway animals. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show; Pups Save an Eagle
programme.desc: A pop star comes to town, but a storm hits Adventure Bay and damages the performance stage, so the gang must fix it quickly; Chickaletta falls near an eagle's nest, but the eagle is caught in twine and is also in danger. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Parroting Pups; Merpups Save the Turbots
programme.desc: Matea tries to help Rocky, who has lost his voice; the Merpups return to assist with a rescue. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save a Playful Dragon; Pups Save the Critters
programme.desc: A playful dragon gets out of one of Alex's books and the pups need to get it back; Francois' trailer becomes unhooked and all of the critters get loose. (repeat)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze sails to Animal Island with Stripes and visits the monster-truck animals there, but soon the island is put in peril by a greedy lizard. (repeat)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: A game of jungle ball gets wacky when Tooks the Tocan is launched from the stadium, and it's up to her friends to get her back in the game. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Penguins; Pups Save a Dolphin Pup
programme.desc: Penguins swipe some fish off of Cap'n Turbot's boat, so the gang try to catch the birds and send them back to the South Pole; a baby dolphin gets stranded in shallow water and needs to be reunited with its parents. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone; Pups Save the Deer
programme.desc: Marshall goes on a solo mission to save some kittens while his pals are at parachute training; a deer clan get stuck on slippery ice and need to be rescued. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe; Pups Save a Train
programme.desc: A tech-savvy boy and a group of rescue pups work together to protect their community. In the series premiere, they save a lost kitty and a doomed train. (repeat)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny; Pups Save the Mayor's Tulips
programme.desc: Hungry bears are in pursuit of Daring Danny X, who's stuck in a tree over a canyon; Mayor Goodway's tulips are damaged prior to a contest, and sabotage is to blame. (repeat)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: There's no room for Squidward in SpongeBob and Patrick's new clubhouse; a homeless sea horse wreaks havoc at the Krusty Krab. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: The Original Fry Cook; Night Light

programme.title: Jamie Johnson
programme.desc: Jamie's on a high - the video of him scoring against Tibbs has gone viral and he's the hero of the school. But all this attention goes to Jamie's head. He forces the team to let him take a penalty and then misses it when he dares a 'Panenka'. Worse still, it's Harry that eventually secures Kingsmount the match. After the match Harry winds him up and Jamie quickly turns it into a fight - has he let everything go to his head?(n)

programme.title: Jamie Johnson
programme.desc: Mindful of his warning Jamie does all that he can to keep a lid on his temper(n)

programme.title: Jamie Johnson
programme.desc: When Harry and Dillon discover that it was Mike who ended Hansard's career with a horror tackle, they do everything they can to wind Jamie up during the cup match. programme.title: Jamie Johnson
programme.desc: It's Dillon's first try out at Hawkstone Academy and Jack is sent along to cover it for the school blog. Jack can't stand seeing Dillon taking Jamie's place and sets out to try and persuade the Hawkstone manager to give Jamie a try. Dillon does well but is bullied by Hawkstone's star player Jethro. Meanwhile Jamie struggles to come to terms with the consequences of his actions and it's only when Mike gives him his beloved Book Of Legends that Jamie finds the final piece of advice he needs... from football legend Ian Wright(n)

programme.title: Jamie Johnson
programme.desc: Its Sports Personality of the Year time at Kingsmount Academy, and school captain Dillon is confident of winning. programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A one-off special about Staggering Storytellers, taking a look at some of literature's greatest works and history's wackiest writers. Along the way the development of storytelling technology is observed, it is revealed how a party at Lord Byron's house led to the writing of the Gothic masterpiece Frankenstein, and how Charles Dickens was the Harry Styles of his day. Spanning 3,000 years of recorded history, the programme takes a look at the funny and ridiculous ways some of the finest writers cured their writing block(n)
